english: Cyclization occurs readily with dilute alkali .
It 's easier to capture a fort from inside ..
chinese: 堡垒更容易从内部攻破。
这些要求很容易得到了采纳。

english: Ray paulsen didn't give up easily .
chinese: 雷波尔森没那么容易就善罢甘休。

english: He is disposed to take offence at trifles .
chinese: 他容易为一点小事发脾气。
容易造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: It 's easy to open a shop but hard to keep it open .
Human nature is particularly prone to it .
chinese: 人性特别容易倾向于这方面。

english: We don't usually deal in perishables .
chinese: 我们一般不经营容易腐烂的商品。

english: This kind of cloth tends to spot in the rain .
chinese: 这种布容易在雨中弄脏。

english: Butter spreads more easily when it is softer .
chinese: 黄油软一些就容易涂抹。

english: I would never call german an easy language .
chinese: 我认为德语可不容易学。

english: How simple it is when one knows nothing .
chinese: 不知道底细，那说说多容易啊。

english: Water will easily permeate a cotton dress .
chinese: 水很容易渗透棉布衣服。

english: Irvine was a man of impulse, a poet .
chinese: 欧文是个诗人，容易感情冲动。
